name: Gary
description:
You play as gary the octopus? and you're mission is to stay alive for as long as possible even though life is suffering.

Use the objects falling from the sky to stop the wall from closing in on you.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to Pick Up/Drop Items

How to play

Place boxes and bananas next to the wall to slow it down.

And use the pipes to temporarily stop the wall.

----------------------------------------------------------------

I made this for Ludum Dare 50

I hope you like it :)))))))
